name: GasPrices
0:
”Alexa, gas prices!”
”What is the price around Planet Fitness?”
”Are gas prices going up?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gas prices
des:
By the way, to use gas prices, make sure to use the invocation name of "gas prices" in order to use this skill. 
If directly asked "What is the price of gas", Alexa will just give average in your area.

Check us out at: gasprices.github.io

**NEW** Try our new Search Feature, which allows you to get the cheapest gas stations of any location!
Try saying: "What is the price around Planet Fitness"

Want to know the cheapest and closest place to fill up your tank? Say: "Alexa, gas prices!" and Alexa will tell you the closest gas stations with the cheapest prices. 


Gas Prices also knows gas price information and price trends across the US and Canada. 


-------Example Utterances-------

"Alexa! Gas Prices!"

The cheapest price for regular is $2.37 at Exxon on 736 Main Street. The closest stations to you selling regular gas are: Mobil on 610 First Street at $2.49, and Sunoco on 45 Wade Rd at $3.01. What else?


"Alexa, ask gas prices for the price overview around Honolulu."

Here's what I have on regular prices at Honolulu: The average is $3.51. The lowest price for regular is $2.95. Prices for regular at Honolulu are staying the same. What else?


"Alexa, ask gas prices for price in Toronto airport."
Here's what I found for regular gas near Toronto Pearson International Airport. The cheapest price for regular is 107.9¢ at Husky on 1553 Shawson Dr. The closest stations selling regular gas are: Shell on 5869 Airport Rd at 117.9¢, and Petro-Canada on 6625 Airport Rd at 115.9¢. Anything else?


"Alexa, ask gas prices for price trend at San Francisco."
Around San Francisco, the price of regular is going up. Anything else?
